Sentencas: This study aims to develop an anode catalyst for a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) using electroless nickel plating.
Titulo: Catalysts characteristics of Ni/YSZ core-shell according to plating conditions using electroless plating

Sentencas: We have proposed a new method for electroless plating of Ni metal on yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) particles.
Titulo: Catalysts characteristics of Ni/YSZ core-shell according to plating conditions using electroless plating

Sentencas: We examine the uniformity of the Ni layer on the plated core-shell powder, in addition to the content of Ni and the reproducibility of the plating.
Titulo: Catalysts characteristics of Ni/YSZ core-shell according to plating conditions using electroless plating

Sentencas: We have also evaluated the carbon deposition rate and characteristics of the SOFC anode catalyst.
Titulo: Catalysts characteristics of Ni/YSZ core-shell according to plating conditions using electroless plating

Sentencas: To synthesize Ni-plated YSZ particles, the plated powder is heat-treated at 1200 A degrees C.
Titulo: Catalysts characteristics of Ni/YSZ core-shell according to plating conditions using electroless plating

Sentencas: The resultant particles, which have an average size of 50 mu m, were subsequently used in the experiment.
Titulo: Catalysts characteristics of Ni/YSZ core-shell according to plating conditions using electroless plating

Sentencas: The size of the Ni particles and the Ni content both increase with increasing plating temperature and plating time.
Titulo: Catalysts characteristics of Ni/YSZ core-shell according to plating conditions using electroless plating

Sentencas: The X-ray diffraction pattern reveals the growth of Ni particles.
Titulo: Catalysts characteristics of Ni/YSZ core-shell according to plating conditions using electroless plating

Sentencas: After heat-treatment, Ni is oxidized to NiO, leading to the co-existence of Ni and NiO; Ni3P is also observed due to the presence of phosphorous in the plating solution.
Titulo: Catalysts characteristics of Ni/YSZ core-shell according to plating conditions using electroless plating

Sentencas: Following heat treatment for 1 h at 1200 A degrees C, Ni is mostly oxidized to NiO.
Titulo: Catalysts characteristics of Ni/YSZ core-shell according to plating conditions using electroless plating

Sentencas: The carbon deposition rate of the reference YSZ powder is 135%, while that of the Ni-plated YSZ is 1%-6%.
Titulo: Catalysts characteristics of Ni/YSZ core-shell according to plating conditions using electroless plating
